data.name: Aquaponics Life
data.detailed_description:
The future of farming: Aquaponics


The human population will always surging up and this will threaten the world foods reserves. Earth cities turns crowded everyday and lots of people need to be fed, but the food farms growing tight on space. Enter Aquaponics, which is the intuitive combination of Aquaculture and Hydroponics, the future of food development system, the urban farming.

Aquaponics Life lets you start and grow your aquaponics business and became the best urban farmer in the city. Grow your food and establish the endless food resources to feed all kinds of customers. Control your farm to gain profit as much as you can while managing the complexity of the aquaponics system to keep it produces.

Key Features

  • Try to grow varieties of plant and fish, each of these has specific behavior that you must reveal.
  • Find the optimal settings to grow the best quality products (set your plants position, maintain the biological control, monitor the nitrite, ammonia, nitrate, temperature, and pH, and lot more features).
  • There are two building classification: (1) Production Building for aquaponics installation to functionate as a fishes, vegetables, and fruits producer, (2) Management Resources Building, functioning to make sure the electricity, water, pipes maintenance, and lot of factors works fine.
  • Recruit and manage the worker robots. Each robots can be customized so it will produces more effective and efficient results.
  • Administer your own business, level up your brand, and sets the prices according to the quality. The aquaponics result must be keep fresh and your sales will be limited for each period of times.
  • In the beginning of your career, you will work only to stock nearest convenience store. Try to increase your reputation so you can sell the commodities in your own mall.
  • Each customer has their own prefences for what they want, encompassing their own favorites fishes, plants, and fruits. Also every customers set with their own purchasing powers.
  • After reaching some reputation points and having a strong brand, you can start designing aquascape, installing a specific aquaponics for decorative fishes and plants, and selling it on the greater scales.

The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers

data.short_description: Aquaponics Life is a business strategy game about an urban farming system aquaponics. You will build the next megacorporation using a modern farming system while finding the best formula to produce various vegetables and fishes.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3, 32-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM.
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WindowsÂ® 7/8/10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 550 or AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
